ygData.subject: Re: /tell problems?
ygData.msgSnippet: You don t happen to have tells turned off in the chat filter?  Can you even do this?
ygData.messageBody:
You don't happen to have tells turned off in the chat filter? Can
you even do this?

>
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> Had a question for those on the list. Over the last three
> days...hmmm...that means since the last patch...hmmmm...I have had problems
> receiving /tells. At least 6 different people have complained that they
> sent me /tells and I never responded. One of them called me last nite and
> said, "Hey! wtf. Are you pissed at me for some reason?" In total
> consternation I asked him what he was talking about and he said he had been
> sending me /tells for the last 20 minutes and I hadn't answered a one. I
> was a city zone at the time so was actually not singing for a change except
> to Carillion various folks looking for new quests. I was able to scroll
> back all the way to when I logged in and there were no /tells from him.
> This was the 5th person in two days to complain that I was ignoring their
> /tells. These are all people I play with all the time so the chance they
> mistyped something is nil. Heck, I work with 3 of them. I told my friend
> to send me another /tell as soon as he got off his phone. I waited for 15
> minutes and never saw anything. I think he gave up in disgust as it was
> getting late, but he hasn't answered my email yet so I don't know for
> certain.
>
> Has anyone else experienced any problems with this or am I the only one
> 'going deaf'?
>
> Kitasi
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
>
